question: You work for an international company, and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country.Write a letter to your manager. In your latter•	Explain why you want to work in the company’s head office for six months•	Say how your work could be done while you are away•	Ask for his/her help in arranging it
text: I am writing this letter in reference to the current openings in the newly launched project named “Digital Supply Chain” in the company’s headquarter, based in Switzerland. As you know, I am actively involved in cloud migration services. Besides, the aforesaid involves the advancement of integration process along with the introduction of certain additional features, as well. Hence, I reckon it would be great if I can be a part of this half-yearly project to comprehend a proper insight, by doing so, we can provide a better experience to our clients.

While I am away, Arjun would be an ideal resource to handle a few specific tasks such as new onboardings, customer’s annual purchase analysis. And, Shweta can assist with the data transfer by coordinating with technical teams. Of course, I will be available via call or email, in case of any emergencies. Regarding the pending tasks which are assigned to me, kindly be assured that I will complete them beforehand.
I hope if you could run some errands and get approval from the management for the same. Plus, you might have to coordinate with the recruiting personnel involved in this operation.
I sincerely appreciate your support and time.
